description:
Yamamoto realizes that the crack in his Shigure Kintoki is an illusion created by the Phantom Knight. He adds Tranquil Rain Flames to Squalo`s Shark Shock (Attacco di Squalo) and hits the Phantom Knight! Yamamoto has swung his sword countless times during his training. Yamamoto says that if his sword cracked, he would know from if there was even a 0.01 gram difference in the weight of his sword. The Phantom Knight is paralyzed and cannot move. Yamamoto smiles at him, straightens his face, and attacks him--!!
Source: crunchyroll
